channel.title: [Linux VPS] Help!
channel.description:
Yesterday, I switched my server over to a Linux/CentOS VPS and it gradually messed up my server. Yes, I know how to run it and all that but there are no longer any shops or npcs. I know it has something to do with the .cfg files but what should I change their extension to or where should I relocate them?
Lastly, I need a Linux Compiler code hence this code doesn't work for me: #!/bin/bash javac *.java
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [Linux VPS] Help!
item.dc:creator: @thisisthe21 thisisthe21
item.description:
@thisisthe21 wrote:

Okay. Yes, I know how to convert it into sh but I don’t believe that’s the correct extension for CFG files in Linux.

Read full topic

item.title: [Linux VPS] Help!
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

My suggestion is go back to windows ^_^. But all I know about Linux is they have to change .bat’s to .sh and yeah one secound I think I saw something about running a server on Linux. I’ll link you it soon.

Edit: Here it is, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,500812.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: [Linux VPS] Help!
item.dc:creator: @thisisthe21 thisisthe21
item.description:
@thisisthe21 wrote:

Yesterday, I switched my server over to a Linux/CentOS VPS and it gradually messed up my server.
Yes, I know how to run it and all that but there are no longer any shops or npcs. I know it has something to do with the .cfg files but what should I change their extension to or where should I relocate them?

Lastly, I need a Linux Compiler code hence this code doesn’t work for me:
#!/bin/bash
javac *.java

Thanks in advance.
